# necromancy-deploy

https://server.wizardry-online.com

```
DropletIp: 167.99.232.196
FloatingIp: 159.203.158.107
```

```
DNS:
Record - Host            - Value
A      - server          - 159.203.158.107
A      - mail            - 159.203.158.107
TXT    - _dmarc          - v=DMARC1; p=reject; adkim=s; aspf=s; pct=100;
TXT    - mail._domainkey - v=DKIM1; 
TXT    -                 - v=spf1 ip4:159.203.158.107 include:mail.wizardry-online.com -all
MX     - mail            - mail.wizardry-online.com
```
